0P00000DM0.F.manager_bio:
Christoph Berger has been a member of cominvest's Equity team since January 2001. As Head of Insurance Dedicated Equities he is responsible for AUM of over EUR 8.2bn. 
Mr. Berger was also responsible as research analyst for capital goods and building materials/construction. Furthermore he was manager of cominvest Plusfonds (S&P Rating âAAâ, Lipper Fund Awards 2007, 2008) and of cominvest Fondak Europa, as well as co-manager of cominvest Fondak.
Christoph joined Allianz Global Investors in 2009 and was a member of the Team âCustomized Balancedâ based in Frankfurt before joining the team âInsurance Dedicated Large Capsâ in 2015. He is a CFA Charter holder.

0P00000DW1.F.summary: Der Fonds investiert in deutsche Standardwerte unter Beimischung kurzlaufender Euro-Anleihen.
0P00000DW1.F.manager_bio: Thomas Orthen is currently lead portfolio manager of Fondak, a German equity strategy. Thomas joined Allianz Global Investors in 2005 as part of the Graduate Trainee Program which included a secondment with the Global Emerging Markets team. In 2007 he formally joined the Emerging European Team as Portfolio Manager. He holds a BA in International Business from the University of Plymouth and a Diplom-Betriebswirt (FH) degree from the University of Applied Sciences in Dortmund, and is a CFA Charter holder.

0P00000OTL.F.summary: Investment in German standard and other equities.

0P00000OYI.F.summary:
ODDO BHF Frankfurt-Effekten fund is a fund classic. It invests in the equity securities of large and medium-sized German companies. To a limited extent, the fund may invest in Euroland equities. The investment policy aims for longer term capital appreciation. The ODDO BHF Frankfurt-Effekten fund is recommendable to conservative equity investors who want
to capture the potential of the German equity market.
